item.title: Cloud Infrastructure Project: Multi-Tier Web Application Deployment
item.description: Objective Link to heading Deploy a scalable, multi-tier web application using a combination of AWS services and Terraform for infrastructure as code (IaC). Outcome Link to heading This project demonstrates advanced skills in cloud architecture, infrastructure automation, and the ability to efficiently manage and deploy scalable web applications. Steps Link to heading Design Architecture: Outlined a multi-tier architecture, defining separation of concerns among web, application, and database layers for optimal scalability and security.

item.title: Containerization with Docker/Kubernetes
item.description: Objective Link to heading Containerize an application and orchestrate its deployment on Kubernetes, demonstrating skills in microservices architecture and container management. Outcome Link to heading Highlighted proficiency in container orchestration, scalability, and system resilience through the effective use of Docker and Kubernetes. Steps Link to heading Containerization: Containerized the application using Docker, creating Dockerfiles to define the application environment and dependencies. Kubernetes Cluster Setup: Configured a Kubernetes cluster, defining pods, services, and deployments to manage the containerized application components.
